languages.text: "Урбенд Драйвстем уважаемый человек — не только на Даргонусе, но и во всем протекторате. Его род многие столетия поддерживает администрирование столицы и логистику между системами фон Валанциус. Благодаря семейству Драйвстем Даргонус на многие годы стал миром порядка и процветания. Более того, Леди Теодора лично настояла, чтобы следующим губернатором стал именно господин Урбенд".

"Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."
languages.original_text: "Урбенд Драйвстем уважаемый человек — не только на Даргонусе, но и во всем протекторате. Его род многие столетия поддерживает администрирование столицы и логистику между системами фон Валанциус. Благодаря семейству Драйвстем Даргонус на многие годы стал миром порядка и процветания. Более того, Леди Теодора лично настояла, чтобы следующим губернатором стал именно господин Урбенд".

For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

languages.text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔是个受人尊敬的人，不仅仅是在达戈努斯，更是在整个王朝。多个世纪以来，他的家族一直支持着首都的行政管理，负责与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝其他属地之间的后勤工作。正是德莱夫斯塔家族的付出，才让达戈努斯多年来一直处于秩序与繁荣之中。更重要的是，西奥多拉夫人本人曾特地要求厄本勋爵担任下一任总督。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔是个受人尊敬的人，不仅仅是在达戈努斯，更是在整个王朝。多个世纪以来，他的家族一直支持着首都的行政管理，负责与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝其他属地之间的后勤工作。正是德莱夫斯塔家族的付出，才让达戈努斯多年来一直处于秩序与繁荣之中。更重要的是，西奥多拉夫人本人曾特地要求厄本勋爵担任下一任总督。”

languages.text: «Urbend Drivestem es un hombre respetado, no solo en Dargonus sino en todo el protectorado. Durante siglos, su casa ha apoyado la administración de la capital y la logística entre los sistemas de los von Valancius. Los esfuerzos de los Drivestems han proporcionado años de orden y prosperidad en Dargonus. Es más, lady Theodora insistió personalmente en que lord Urbend fuera el siguiente gobernador».
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: «Urbend Drivestem es un hombre respetado, no solo en Dargonus sino en todo el protectorado. Durante siglos, su casa ha apoyado la administración de la capital y la logística entre los sistemas de los von Valancius. Los esfuerzos de los Drivestems han proporcionado años de orden y prosperidad en Dargonus. Es más, lady Theodora insistió personalmente en que lord Urbend fuera el siguiente gobernador».

languages.text: 「アーベント・ドライブステムはダルゴナスだけでなく、保護領全土で尊敬されている人物です。何世紀にもわたり、彼の家系は首都の行政やフォン・ヴァランシウス星系間の物流を支えてきました。ドライブステム家の尽力のおかげで、ダルゴナスの秩序と繁栄は長年にわたり保たれてきました。また、シオドーラ様は自らアーベント卿を次期総督にするよう強く希望されました」
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベント・ドライブステムはダルゴナスだけでなく、保護領全土で尊敬されている人物です。何世紀にもわたり、彼の家系は首都の行政やフォン・ヴァランシウス星系間の物流を支えてきました。ドライブステム家の尽力のおかげで、ダルゴナスの秩序と繁栄は長年にわたり保たれてきました。また、シオドーラ様は自らアーベント卿を次期総督にするよう強く希望されました」

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem ist überaus angesehen – nicht nur auf Dargonus, sondern im gesamten Protektorat. Über viele Jahrhunderte hat sein Haus die Verwaltung der Hauptstadt und die Logistik zwischen den Systemen derer von Valancius unterstützt. Das Wirken der Drivestems hat über Jahre auf Dargonus für Ordnung und Wohlstand gesorgt. Außerdem hat Lady Theodora persönlich darauf bestanden, dass Lord Urbend zum nächsten Gouverneur ernannt wird."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem ist überaus angesehen – nicht nur auf Dargonus, sondern im gesamten Protektorat. Über viele Jahrhunderte hat sein Haus die Verwaltung der Hauptstadt und die Logistik zwischen den Systemen derer von Valancius unterstützt. Das Wirken der Drivestems hat über Jahre auf Dargonus für Ordnung und Wohlstand gesorgt. Außerdem hat Lady Theodora persönlich darauf bestanden, dass Lord Urbend zum nächsten Gouverneur ernannt wird."

languages.text: « Urbend Drivestem est un homme respecté, non seulement sur Dargonus, mais dans le protectorat tout entier. Pendant des siècles, sa maison a contribué au bon fonctionnement de l'administration de la capitale et à la logistique entre les systèmes des von Valancius. Grâce aux Drivestem, Dargonus a connu des années d'ordre et de prospérité. De plus, dame Théodora a personnellement insisté pour que le seigneur Urbend soit le prochain gouverneur. »
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: « Urbend Drivestem est un homme respecté, non seulement sur Dargonus, mais dans le protectorat tout entier. Pendant des siècles, sa maison a contribué au bon fonctionnement de l'administration de la capitale et à la logistique entre les systèmes des von Valancius. Grâce aux Drivestem, Dargonus a connu des années d'ordre et de prospérité. De plus, dame Théodora a personnellement insisté pour que le seigneur Urbend soit le prochain gouverneur. »

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem; sadece Dargonus'ta değil, tüm protektorada saygı duyulan bir adamdır. Drivestem Hanesi, yüz yıllardır başkentin idaresine ve von Valancius sistemleri arasındaki lojistiğe destek olmuştur. Drivestem hanesinin emeği sayesinde Dargonus, yıllarca düzen ve refah görmüştür. Üstelik Leydi Theodora, sıradaki valinin bilhassa Lord Urbend olmasında şahsen ısrarcıydı."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem is a well-respected man — and not just on Dargonus but throughout the protectorate. For many centuries, his house has supported the capital's administration and the logistics between the von Valancius systems. The Drivestems' efforts secured years of order and prosperity for Dargonus. What's more, Lady Theodora personally insisted that Lord Urbend specifically be made the next governor."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, sırf Dargonus'tan öte, tüm protektora boyunca saygı duyulan bir adamdır. Drivestem hanesi, yüz yıllardır başkentin idaresine ve von Valancius sistemleri arasındaki lojistiğe destek olmuştur. Drivestem hanesinin emeği sayesinde, Dargonus yıllarca düzene ve refaha kavuştu. Üstelik Leydi Theodora, sıradaki valinin bilhassa Lord Urbend olmasında şahsen ısrarcıydı."
